projects.title: Digital Twin Blockchain Pilot
projects.subtitle: Space- and Web3-enabled coordination for verifiable AEC delivery
projects.description: Using satellite data, IoT, AI, and blockchain, our pilot automates approvals and payments for cutting rework, verifying carbon savings, and speeding up retrofit delivery.

projects.title: TRACE Marketplace Pilot
projects.subtitle: Blockchain-enabled material passports & circular supply for construction materials
projects.description: TRACE connects reuse hubs, demolition contractors, and builders through blockchain-verified material passports — turning waste into traceable, reusable resources.

projects.title: DeFab Pilot
projects.subtitle: Decentralised 3D printing for verifiable construction supply chains
projects.description: Localised, on-demand fabrication using blockchain and AI to verify materials, automate provenance, and advance circular 3D construction.

projects.title: Blockchain Weaving Pilot
projects.subtitle: Encoding cultural heritage through blockchain and parametric design
projects.description: Preserving Al Sadu weaving heritage through blockchain and parametric design — turning traditional craft into verifiable digital memory.
